website_summaries.verdict: Another non-lethal option for those wanting a safe self-defense mechanism with discreet carrying.
pros: Comes in a pack of five for multiple uses
Includes 5 keychain rings for simple storage and portability
Ridged handle allows for a firm grip
Sharp edge aids in punching and hitting
cons: A few of the product's edges arrived dull

customer_reviews.title: These things are huge
customer_reviews.text: Okay so these things are huge. I thought it would be something I could keep on the keychain with my car keys lol NOPE they are really big but hey, you could definitely defend yourself with one. It’s pretty blunt but right at the tip it’s sharp enough to do damage. I don’t know why I didn’t realize it was a multipack, but now I can accessorize my shank with my outfit. No seriously I bought this to take with me on jogs. It’s too big for that but I’ll keep one in my car just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Unassuming
customer_reviews.text: I have the black one on my key chain and gave the rest away to friends. The metal is very light but it feels sturdy in you hand. I haven't had a reason to use it on a person (thankfully) but I've used it to stab holes through things like cardboard and it stays firmly in your hand even when it meets resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kubaton for self defense.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised and should do the job in an attack. Youtube has instructional videos on how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Who

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I got this pack to share with my family and they’re awesome! Easy to find your keys in a big purse and a nice little self defense tool. *dont forger to remove from keys if going to the airport or in certain bars*
customer_reviews.author: Grandslamber

customer_reviews.title: I feel protected
customer_reviews.text: The big thing about these is that they can break a window and that they look threatening. I gave my extras to all my roommates at college
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel extra SAFE
customer_reviews.text: I feel super safe carrying this, & I feel much better about my 18yr old daughter running around on her own since she has one for her key-chain. It's very light weight. Checkout YouTube "how to use Kubaton" videos, a law enforcement officer interviewed several rapists & they ALL said they would automatically avoid anyone carrying this item. Nice to have a deterrent & hope we'll never need to use!
customer_reviews.author: MissTEX

customer_reviews.title: Serious Defense⚒
customer_reviews.text: These are lighter than others that I have purchased and given as gifts. So these won't damage the ignition on your car. For ladies with little ones the sharp point on the end will require discernment on your part🔥🔨 The paint does not chip as easily as on other defense keys. The Anti-Wolf will get someone off you with little or no problems🔥🔨 Again, but be very aware of little ones and their proximity🔥🔨 The package price with 5 defense key rings included is Awesome🔥🔥🔥
customer_reviews.author: MIGHTYMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very light weight, but feels like it can do some serious damage with force. The tip is pointy but not too sharp. Fits well in my hand. Is a bit long on a keychain but I've had it on my keys and nobody seems to notice it. I definitely feel safer with this. I've seen them on other websites for 3 times the price. Happy with this purchase and will order another pack for stocking stuffers this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Rivera

customer_reviews.title: I think it will do the job if or when you need to defend yourself
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors, Lager than I expected, Looks like it will cause damage to someone if and when you need to defend yourseld
customer_reviews.author: regina

customer_reviews.title: I'm confused....
customer_reviews.text: I recieved the package today with the key chain ring missing the actual pieces. Says inspected? By a blind person?
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I gave one to each of my friends. Light weight and won't cause strain to the ignition when used as a key chain.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect keychain protection
customer_reviews.text: As a mom of 2 toddlers and a newborn I need to carry things like this for a little added protection. I’m pretty sure I would be overpowered in hand to hand combat so I just need something to give me a bit of time to run away, pretty sure this would to the trick if need be. I loved the price for all 5! I’m gifting the extras to my sisters and mom.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made. Should be in every woman's purse.
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended to me by a friend. They showed up in good shape and seem incredibly sturdy. I appreciate an easy to have safety tool. Also would be good to break glass in a car. I didn't really need 5 but I will be giving them as gifts at a girls night.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ross

customer_reviews.title: A Great Self-Defense Tool (With The Proper Training)
customer_reviews.text: We like the fact that these kubotans are very functional, slender enough to easily fit the hands of the women we teach Self-Defense to, very sturdy, and the price point is also very good. NOTE: if you are going to purchase a kubotan and carry it with you, PLEASE take a class in how to properly use it BEFORE you carry it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Super fast shipping 😁
customer_reviews.text: This is must have you can never be too safe with all the craziness today. Super fast shipping 😁
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I bought them for myself and family members. Easy to carry around and have ready if needed. Update: I've bought 2 more packs of these since Christmas. I enjoy being able to give them to family and friends for protection. I keep one by the door for when I take my dog out, one in my truck and one in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Kelley

customer_reviews.title: They look like an obscene bedroom tool.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know they'd be so LONG. They cannot hang off your key chain without someone looking at you in a strange manner. Someone will think you're a Dominatrix. I keep mine in my glove box. They are handy for pulling out knots...kind of like a Marlin Spike. I probably will keep one on a key ring in my back jeans pocket if I'm hiking. They can be a very useful tool when you need to defend yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Alabama Coastal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as birthday party favors for my sisters and friends. I like the idea that it will break glass- hope that includes a car window if needed. Big for a keychain; need to find a way to carry without putting a hole in my purse!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Levesque

customer_reviews.title: Refund for False Advertising Please
customer_reviews.text: They aren’t aluminum as described. They’re plastic attached to a keychain ring.
customer_reviews.author: XDark_Amethystx

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I would give a 0 if possible. I was given a similar looking anit-wolf defense key chain as a Christmas gift and loved it so much I decided to buy this package to share with friends, and have an extra for my car. This item was much lighter in weight and did not have as sharp or hard a point as the one that was gifted to me. I returned as I doubt it would be useful if ever needed. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived just as shown and described
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived just as described and shown in the photograph. Work requires me to travel to different locations in the early AM hours. Typically I am the only person around until I can get into the buildings. It can be a little creepy in some areas. My plan is to carry the key chain to and from my vehicle when I am alone and give a few to friends and coworkers. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sled Better

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love my kubuton! I show apartments for a living & run into a lot of weirdos. It’s perfect because I always have my keys on me & it makes me feel safer. I like that I’m the driving force behind it if I need to use it, compared to something like pepper spray. The paint stays on well & the colors are so vibrant! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: Solid.
customer_reviews.text: Solid one piece metal construction. Not too heavy. Works well as a key chain. Gave this to my kids for their house keys. The point is not overly sharp for carrying purposes and won’t damage pockets or purses but it will be sharp enough if used in defense. Think of it like a ball point pen tip for comparison. 5 for under $10 when I bought it. So it was worth it to me - a good value. Also makes losing the keys a little harder.
customer_reviews.author: Lonni W

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issue
customer_reviews.text: No quality control. The order came with 4, but it was supposed to come with 5.
customer_reviews.author: YogaLife

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and small enough to zip in an adult coat pocket.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t attest to how well these work for defense, thank goodness, but they look a little intimidating. I have purchased several sets of them to give to my girlfriends and their daughters as well as my own kids. They aren’t sharp enough to scratch anything just by light contact, but surely could do damage with intention. I’ll be buying more as everyone who sees ours asks about getting one. They are inexpensive enough to gift even to strangers on occasion.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingMom

customer_reviews.title: So Glad I Ordered 2 Sets
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, light weight personal safety device, that doesn’t initially / necessarily look like a tool that you would use to defend yourself. They are comfortable in your hand, no matter what size and an EXCELLENT price! Additionally, it was a super easy transaction and the items came very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Liza Cortijo

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: As described. The grooves fit my small fingers and it's lightweight. The colors make it pretty and fashionable. I loved the color options. I plan on gifting them. One to my friend's daughter who is going away to college. "glad to see you following your dreams, oh btw, here's a key chain weapon to keep you safe". :) I have one on my key chain, one in my car, and one in my house. I saw a pt's family member with something very similar. He showed me how, if someone grabs your hand, how to press the point into the inside of their wrist. Or just stab if no other choice.
customer_reviews.author: PET

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted. You get 5 for a low price, but they feel solid and well made, albeit slim. While this item is one that cannot be brought on airplanes (con), I felt it would be more effective as a self defense tool than the flat blunted versions that would be allowed. Because this one, while also meant for "pressure point application", could do some real damage if necessary. The tip isn't sharp, per se, but it could potentially puncture "pressure points" (pro). I kept one of them for myself and have given the other four to friends and family. They were happily received with enthusiasm.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but big
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving these 5 stars because I think they're GREAT quality for the price. I just wish they made a slightly smaller version. I'm a woman with fairly small hands, and these just feel a bit too large for me. My fingers don't naturally fall into the finger grooves.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: worth it, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: as a plan B tool for an earth that is not always safe-- wolves dressed as humans can be anywhere anytime -- best to have a plan B-- as I am aging I carry pepper spray and this striking tool-- better than nothing--- and very affordable
customer_reviews.author: Tracey D.

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely get them
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I mainly got for my niece because she walks bake and forth to work alone but I also like how they send more then one so I could keep one for myself and for my mother. I also like they fit in your hand so you can actually hold onto while walking to your car at night or walking anywhere. I would definitely share with anyone to get these because as sad as it to say we as females or males need protection nowadays!
customer_reviews.author: Dalena

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Must have! I bought these and have the others to my friends and they loved them! Exactly as pictured! Very durable and sturdy. It has been on my keys for months and does not show any scratches. I feel a little safer having it! Everyone asks me where I got it because they want one!
customer_reviews.author: Hayhay12

customer_reviews.title: Feel so much safer!
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully I haven’t had to use it yet. I bought these because the apartment were currently living in has an underground garage and it’s dark, with some suspicious characters on occasion. I feel so much better holding this in my hand when walking to my car. It’s light weight, and I can tell with the right force it could cause some major damage. The only drawback is that it does look like some kind of sex toy on a keychain, but it’s worth it to carry it around in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Help with peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Got these after walking home in the dark one night. There had been a vehicle on the side of the road and I could hear them playing with the locks on the door as I walked past. I have a black belt, but it's been years since I've gone to a dojo. This really makes me feel secure having them as an extra measure. Make sure you know how to hold and use them prior to an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect self-defense devise that doesn't look like a self-defense devise.
customer_reviews.text: I often walk or take Lyft/Uber. I wanted a self-defense item that wouldn't be obvious (as surprise is a critical component of successful self-defense). This is perfect. I put it on my key chain and it looks like a girly icicle, but is very solid and (I have no doubt) can do serious damage when used properly. I kept one for myself and gave the other 4 to friends for their personal safety.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Newman

customer_reviews.title: Mother's Day Gifts
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for gifts for my closest friends for Mother's Day. After the fire in Paradise, we all found an apartment complex to move to, so that we would be together, but it's in a town with a lot of homeless people that roam the street. We have all been approached at some point and I just wanted them, and myself, to have something to make us feel like we have a little extra protection. (Aside from the tasers we are all equipped with!)
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Jordan Shields

customer_reviews.title: Must have for just about everyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the ladies in my life. If you get put in a choke hold and have access to this, you can stab them in the thigh or under the arm around your neck to hopefully get out of what would normally be a finishing move. I even carry one now. The thumb fits in with the key ring giving you a real good grip. I was impressed and for only ten dollars, even better.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pedlar

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for a woman of a certain age
customer_reviews.text: These tools are fierce and give me (and the friends I have given them to) a sense of security. I often have to take my dog out late at night for a final deposit in the poop bank and I feel much safer having this tool at my disposal. I hope I never have to use it but being a woman of a certain age it does give me a greater layer of protection should the unexpected occur. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: la babs

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the ladies in your life
customer_reviews.text: I kept one and gave the rest away as gifts. Yes, they are a tad large, but if you are using them for protection, this is exactly the size they need to be! After having it on my keychain for a few weeks, I stopped noticing the size. I have a new way of holding my keys and am very pleased. And yes, these can and will cause substantial damage if you need them to.
customer_reviews.author: GandD

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These are bigger than I thought they would be, but that's not a complaint. They're easy to hold and they could do some damage if used correctly. My son and I tested them out on a few things. I put one on my keychain and gave one to my teenage daughter. I'll be happy to give extras to friends if they want one. I like that I can easily hold it inconspicuously in my hand as I'm walking.
customer_reviews.author: KelBee

customer_reviews.title: ass.
customer_reviews.text: lol this isnt even sharp. i was really disappointed i tried it on myself to see if it was and it was horrible. i don’t recommend lol you’d die if u tried using this to defend urself.
customer_reviews.author: sanoo

customer_reviews.title: Feel very strong. Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Although haven’t actually used them.. I Watched some YouTube videos and was so excited to receive them. My boyfriend chuckled at the cute colors and how they look, until I showed him what they could do and he carries one now too. Realized on the way to the airport that I had one on my keychain still and didn’t want any trouble, so, I had to toss it 😩
customer_reviews.author: mich

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! This is my first year in college and I bought these towards the beginning of the semester for extra safety. I personally don’t like pepper spray because it can so easily go off, so this was a great find. It comes with 5 of them, which is great for the price. I gave one to all of my girlfriends as well. Very sturdy. The only problem would be that they are on the large side, probably the length of my hand from fingertip to bottom of palm and so they can be a bit of a bother to say put your keys in a jean pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Security Gifts
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to give to the Wife , Daughters & Daughter-in-laws in my clan, with ALL the Lawlessness & Debauchery in the world today...it give some comfort and peace of mind just knowing these are hanging on your key ring or within reach if God forbid they need them! Sturdy, Solid...and with a little knowledge.....Effective!
customer_reviews.author: Cobb

customer_reviews.title: one for me, the other four for my friends
customer_reviews.text: Better than just holding your keys...this is an effective weapon. Female friends are raving about it, and all have begun to hold onto it properly. Always good to be aware and prepared.
customer_reviews.author: rokqueenLA

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy and well made. Bought these and a stainless kubaton. These are light enough to be carried on a keychain, and come in handy as a multi tool as well. And, you can't beat the price, which I thought would translate to a lack of quality upon arrival, but they're outstanding. The set I received was flawless. I kept two, and gave the others to a few friends. They love them too.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Stocking Stuffers
customer_reviews.text: Gave these away as stocking stuffers for all my fellow girlfriends who have to walk alone to their cars, after work. I even kept one for myself. They were a hit. Hopefully, no one will have to use them but I will be ordering another pack because everyone loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Blue

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy
customer_reviews.text: Good buy ...but i take it to run with .....but when your palms get sweaty may not be very affective to use ...it'll slip right through your hand ...thinking of taping the top of it to get a better grip
customer_reviews.author: ECE

customer_reviews.title: Stocking Stuffers
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They arrived yesterday and I was very happy with my purchase. They are very sturdy and fit the hand comfortably. I bought the 5-pack to give to female friends and family as stocking stuffers for Christmas. I realized that wasn't enough, so I'm back to buy more. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: DLeu

customer_reviews.title: Really Effective but Too Big to be Practical
customer_reviews.text: These are way bigger than I expected. That's on me for not paying closer attention to the specs, but they are nearly as long as my hand so they aren't practical to hook to my clutch purse like I intended. I'm sure they'd do a great job for self-defense but I'm not sure how to reasonably keep it on my person.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Get one - use it for defense only or you will go to jail
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. They have weight and are a brilliant tool to jab into an attacker to get away. You can take a eye out with this thing. A nice addition to my pepper spray and tazer. You get 5 so I can share with some of my girlfriends. Let’s eradicate Violence against Women and start fighting back
customer_reviews.author: ky

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my family. They are a great lightweight, portable item for self-defense. They seem to be made from solid aluminum, so will last a very long time. The color is painted on, so over time, it will wear off, especially if used as a keychain. I hope we never have to use them, but I am confident they will serve their purpose if it comes down to it.
customer_reviews.author: EdVanB

customer_reviews.title: California Legal
customer_reviews.text: Tips are sharper than similar products. Great for opening boxes as well as defending yourself. Colors are beautiful and as shown. Had these awhile and the paint isn’t fading or chipping. I live in California and asked the Sheriffs and Police Departments if this was legal to carry. It is and they even instructed me on how to use it in self defense. Makes a great little gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tigger

customer_reviews.title: Larger than I imagined, but will certainly do the job!
customer_reviews.text: They are much larger than I imagined but seem like they will do the job if I needed to use it. I like that I can share one with my mom and sister and still have two left to give to someone else who may need one. A bit long and clunky for a keychain but I don’t mind if it saved my life!
customer_reviews.author: stephanieinohio

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a self defense tool. It’s very sharp so be careful when touching the tip and keep it away from children. I love the colors. I also like that I can put it on my key chain. The grip on it is very unique it’s easy to grip when placing your fingers on it. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kit Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for friends!
customer_reviews.text: There's been an alarming upsurge of disappearances of black women in Chicago where I live so I've just been terrified of being abducted so I've just been trying to find new self defense tools and came across these. I bought these and kept 2 for myself and gave the rest to my sister and friends. I played around with this thing and it easily tears through anything and will be lethal in case of an attack. I love it. It feels comfortable in my hand, easily fits on my keychain or in my pocket. It's also heavy enough to crack someone in the forehead if you don't want to stab them.
customer_reviews.author: Blessedchild93

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It is light and sturdy. But it is slightly bulky on the keychain. And if I have a lot of keys, it’s actually a little inconvenient when you try to use it. But other than that, it’s great! I like how there’s 5 of them so I can put it in multiple locations or give it to other people as well. The microtip is pretty sharp but it won’t cut your skin if you accidentally touch it or anything. Overall, I got what I expected so I’m happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: NGCoffee

customer_reviews.title: Thank you. A big hit.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone wondered if it could break a ca r window if one were to get trapped inside. We knew they can't be taken on a plane but curious to know legality of carrying it or if it would be taken away in non carry on bags at the airport!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: make sure she is safe
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my girlfriend and my self, I told her a quick jab to the chest or eye and your attacker will surely run in pain, being said not trying to sound barbaric but the attack on single women has drastically increased so this is perfect light and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: “Pretty” deadly
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had to use them yet, but they are really pretty colors, solid material and grip easy. A little bigger than I thought, still looking for something a little more Concealed. Are used to have this keychain that had holes in the eyes of a cat in the ears where the weapon, I’m still looking to replace that. But these are really cool and as advertised
customer_reviews.author: RAP1973

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely
customer_reviews.text: These key chains are light enough to carry on your keys daily, and fits nicely in your hand. Decent product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for $
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as sharp as i thought it was gonna be (which is a good thing since i almost dropped it on my foot attaching it to my keys) seems more like a deterrent to me but will definitely be taking it with me while I’m out running or alone at night. I can’t tell how long it’ll last but it feels sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey F.

customer_reviews.title: Don't want to be on the receiving end of this
customer_reviews.text: I originally got these to give to my wife and daughter. My daughter is in college and my wife works and takes uber/Lyft to and from. They both carry pepper spray too, but I wanted something else for the to have with it. They are lightweight. The point on the end is pretty sharp. It will definitely break the skin if ever have to be used. I ended up putting one in my keychain too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. All of the colors are beautiful & it’s a color for everyone! The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is the color fades. Other than that it’s good. “So far so good!” Luckily, I haven’t had to use them & I honestly pray I don’t have to. But when I do, I feel I’ll be well prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had to use yet, thank God!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this to carry while trail running alone in the Rocky Mtns in intense Mtn Lion country. My daughter and daughter-in-law both run, and often in remote rural or urban areas. Their threat is human male predators instead of Mtn Lions, unfortunately ( remember recent Massachusetts and Iowa murders of young women runners). Hopefully we won't ever have to use... the thing is light weight, and has a nice way to attach a cord to it.
customer_reviews.author: colorado farmer

customer_reviews.title: Practical and good looking
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the practicality and ease of finding keys in purse. I gave one to my daughter but she's afraid to carry it to school for fear of being caught with a "weapon". My mom didn't want one, she said it was too big. I think it's just the right size so you can get a firm grip on it.
customer_reviews.author: ladena

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for myself and coworkers as we work at a small retail store and close quite late. Having a 75% female team, closing can be scary late at night. Other than one coworker losing hers to our courthouse, they've given us some peace of mind when walking out at night.
customer_reviews.author: Cely

customer_reviews.title: Big, bold and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful. The colors are vibrant. They are very strong and sturdy. They are large though so be aware that they don't fit iij n with your keys. They will definitely stand out . But they are beautiful enough to look over.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela B

customer_reviews.title: Protection
customer_reviews.text: I carry one of these for safety while I run to protect myself from male predators or dogs. Haven’t used it yet but gives me a sense of security. About the length of a pencil but thicker, groves for your fingers and surprisingly sharp when forcefully used.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Marie

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I’ve put them on my keychain and gave them to a couple friends, as well as my 18 year old daughter that is starting college. I havent has to use one yet, thank goodness, but I love how easy they are to old and small enough to put in a bag or on a key chain.
customer_reviews.author: JayDoc

customer_reviews.title: Great for self defense.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. Great colors and they feel like you could really hurt someone if needed. I watched a self defense video so I would know how to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kat G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for loved ones for personal protection. I like flipping my keys into my hand like a butterfly knife knowing it’s not an illegal knife but it will deliver a discouraging blow to any attacker without hurting my hand.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for walking to your car at night, great protection. The only thing that sucks is if I had to stab someone and it stuck in them, I would have a really hard time getting it out and they could run away with my keys.
customer_reviews.author: JamesLY

customer_reviews.title: sleek
customer_reviews.text: just received this in the mail and have already attached it to another alarm-type keychain. looking to have handy when i travel alone or go out at night. super easy to hang on to and doesn't look harmful at first glance.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Alfieri

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: The point is blunt, don’t see how this can be used for self defense
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great and I’m glad I ordered them. Clip them to your keychain or carry them alone. A great deterrent for an attacker. You can do some damage with them. Have enough for my daughters and granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Evans

customer_reviews.title: this design may be considered a weapon.
customer_reviews.text: I gave these away as gifts. Some places may consider these weapons. There are other styles that are aluminum or wood dowel shaped without a point. Quite frankly, I would prefer those in black or brown.
customer_reviews.author: kbooky

customer_reviews.title: Great value - a bit smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat value for money. This is gift for wife and daughter. I still have my Kuboton from the 90s - that’s how durable these can be. The only thing I didn’t like and pictures didn’t show is that it’s a bit smaller than I thought yet perfect for my daughter and wife to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Surprising
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't look like much until you test the tip - that's where the magic happens. Hopefully we never have to be that close range to someone to have to use this but it's good to know that in a crunch, we have it!
customer_reviews.author: Safyre Spitfire

customer_reviews.title: Keep my daughter safe!
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter had a 'deviant' follow her after she parked back at her dorm at the university - she had to run. Got her these and Pepper spray, she liked them, put at least one everywhere she would have access to
customer_reviews.author: Raul E.

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: My wife works in a shady area, and i feel a tiny bit better knowing she has one of these to gouge into a creep if need be. Sturdy, light weight, and sharp as hell.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Healy

customer_reviews.title: Self defense essential
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a bit of a scare in a parking lot, which led me to buy these. I gifted one to my sister, and keep the others as spares. I use this to carry my whole keychain, it fits nicely in my hand and now I don't feel as unprepared when I'm walking alone.
customer_reviews.author: Inga

customer_reviews.title: Big enough to hold on to - strong enough to do some damage, if needed
customer_reviews.text: I love these - it sure beats a big hat pin. I have it in an outside pocket in my purse, with the wrist strap visible and put it on my wrist when I leave a store and head out into the parking lot. Have give a couple to friends and they love them too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy and durable. I love that I get a pack of these. I Keep one in my car, in my purse, next to my bed, and I gave one to my mom for her to keep in her purse. Really easy to hold on to. Stay safe ladies!!
customer_reviews.author: DestinyD99

customer_reviews.title: The picture matches to what you get in the mail! :)
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color of the kubotans; vibrant. Each one looked nice and no chipping on them. The descriptions were helpful as well. It was nice to see a picture of the model hand holding one, for anyone who’s a visual person. The picture looked like exactly like what I got in the mail. I was satisfied with the delivery time as well and the little thank you key chain was cute and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Give them to your gal pals
customer_reviews.text: I kept one and gave one to my close friends to protect ourselves when we're out alone. None of us have had to use it yet but we all agree that we feel more secure and safe with it in our hands.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Safe Protection
customer_reviews.text: I like these, they definitely are very sturdy feeling and I feel safer having it on me, it’s a good alternative to my pocket knife. Kept 1 and gifted the rest to my mom, husband and girlfriends
customer_reviews.author: Sarah  Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these self defense key chains for Christmas gift for co-workers, they feel sturdy and durable. They are larger than expected but I guess one will be able to find their keys and also I think will hold up if need to use to protect oneself.
customer_reviews.author: Addie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I bought these.
customer_reviews.text: I think they are more dangerous to carry if I were to fall holding one. Also, it dangles into my leg when it hangs from my key chain while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy for aluminum
customer_reviews.text: These are quite heavy and, while not sharpened, would probably do some damage to an attacker if used. I doubt they would be acceptable in your purse on an airline, so better put them in your luggage if you are traveling.
customer_reviews.author: zdragon

customer_reviews.title: This purchase make me feel better!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted to my 14 year old daughter and her girlfriends so I fell better when they go outside my house! I love that it comes in multi-pack with different colors so I can give them out and do not have to make multiple purchases.
customer_reviews.author: ~TK~

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts
customer_reviews.text: Love these they will break anything w a slight touch glass window and a persons anything for self-defense they look cool toooo I give them to all my friends and buy in packs for presents
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Wish I got this sooner, feeling safer out alone
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp, convenient length, fun colors. Got a pack to give one each to my mother and sister. Always get asked about it, & end up sharing the link to this. The ring attached to end I like to keep around thumb in sweater for quick access if necessary when walking around school at night. Makes me feel secure.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for the young women in my family. It adds a little more security while going to work and school. I even carry one. I am ordering more because everyone who sees them wants one also.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Like to have!
customer_reviews.text: These are very lightweight and sturdy, the point could really do some damage. Thankfully! I’ve never had to use it, but it brings me peace of mind to carry one. Good value, imo.
customer_reviews.author: Vlarr

customer_reviews.title: Solid. Great price
customer_reviews.text: These feel like solid aluminum. Handy for loosening knots. Could definitely be effective for self defense if used right. Perhaps the round end could be rounded and use for massage.
customer_reviews.author: Realist

customer_reviews.title: vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for giveaways at an event. They are great! Unfortunately they arrived 3 days after the event due to a shipping error. I will hold them for Christmas :(
customer_reviews.author: a. jones

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts for all your friends
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as Christmas gifts to my coworkers. What a great protection tool and so handy to carry on your keyring. These are much better than the stainless steel ones because they aren't too heavy to put on your keyring.
customer_reviews.author: LadySong

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and a lot of product for the cost
customer_reviews.text: If someone tries to attack you this is gonna hurt a lot. It’s safe to carry on your keychain and I have one in the car too. It came with enough that I gave them to my husband, daughter and son for their cars too.
customer_reviews.author: Tash

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets
customer_reviews.text: I love these self defense spikes. I don’t keep it on my keys because it weighs the product down. I prefer to keep it loose in my coat pocket or on the outside pocket of my purse where I can easily take it out if needed. Also it comes with 5 so you can share. It’s very lightweight but feels sturdy in hand and can definitely do some damage!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Gonsalves

product_meta.title: Self-Defence Key Chain Aluminum Anti-Wolf Defense Keychain, Ladies's Aviation Rings - 1 Pack with 5 items
feature_bullets: ✔ The key chain defense Surface through special processing, not easily get scratches
✔ Come with keychain ring, easy to take along with. you may just install it on your keychain,also put it on your bag for convenient use
✔ The self defense key chain is made of solid avation aluminum(solid),It's a must self-protection tool for you and your family.
✔ Package included 5 pack of metal defense keychain(Black, pink, silver, purple, blue) different colors for the defense key chains, it can be also a good gift to your female friends
